case.title: NO TOUCHING (WEST END, LONDON)
case.text: I am trying to realise this little fantasy scenario with a confident, outgoing, broad minded female - is that you? And, can you help? A no touching visit. Would you enjoy visiting me and just letting me look at you. That's it. Nothing else. I have no need to touch you at all, just myself :-) Come along today if this sounds like an interesting adventure for you, I can accommodate at my place almost any time, let me know when works for you, even if it is early morning or lunchtimes or just after work. But as I said, any time is good for me so let me know. You can be any status, I am the soul of discretion and expect same in return. Also, you can come as you are.... no need to shave, wear make-up or dress up, the girl next door look is cool. Just please be female and up for this adventure. I'm in my mid-fifties so if you are not ageist and a lot younger than me, and confident enough to visit me, that's great. If you are my age that's good too, we will have something in common... :-) I'm a fit and active man, neatly bearded, with dark hair, light brown eyes with a naughty twinkle. I'm tall, white British, and very presentable for my age. If this ad is still here, I'm still looking, email me.
